numpy
scipy
matplotlib

[docs]
sphinx
sphinx_rtd_theme
sphinx-argparse
sphinxcontrib-bibtex

[vasp]

[vasp:python_version < "3.6"]
monty<=v4.0.2

[vasp:python_version >= "3.6"]
numpy>=1.17

pymatgen

pymatgen==2018.1.19
ruamel.yaml<=0.15.94
numpy~=1.16

[vasp:python_version ~= "3.5"]
pymatgen<=2019.6.20

[vasp:python_version ~= "3.6"]
